text:
Today, we launched a pre-registration event on Tiktok!

We used a TikTok effect game and asked influencers specializing in effect games to create videos for us.

Now, over 670 ppl have played our effect game

Let’s keep watching and see how it goes. @_buildspace @_nightsweekends https://t.co/1rNcEHfiiW

user_info.name: 乱暴ウサギ | Madrabbit | night&weekend s5🔥
user_info.description: 収集ゲームを開発中｜荒々しいので注意｜Twitter漫画、インスタ漫画好き｜building a gacha based collecting game @roomix_official @roomix_japan｜@_nightsweekends s5🔥
